mapper.select: SELECT id id, leader_id leaderId, user_id userId, CASE type_id WHEN '1' THEN '咨询' WHEN '5' THEN '建言' WHEN '2' THEN '投诉' WHEN '6' THEN '求助' WHEN '9' THEN '感谢' END typeId, field field, title title, passage passage, ask_passage askPassage, extra_passage extraPassage, CASE is_process WHEN 'true' THEN '已回复' WHEN 'false' THEN '待回复' END isProcess, DATE_FORMAT( time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' ) time FROM front_left_message where leader_id=#{id}
